Software

Protein Networks

    D-SCRIPT

    Sequence-based prediction of protein-protein interactions using a protein language model.

    PHILHARMONIC

    An engine for biological hypothesis generation and de novo functional inference in non-model organisms.

    TT3D

    Updates Topsy-Turvy to use explicit protein structure information based on the Foldseek 3di sequence.

    Topsy-Turvy

    Improves upon D-SCRIPT by integrating top-down (graph-based) and bottom-up (sequence-based) prediction of protein-protein interactions.

Drug Discovery

    ConPLex

    High-throughput prediction of drug-target interactions using a protein language model and contrastive learning.

Protein Structure

    Seq2Symm

    Accurate and high-throughput prediction of the quaternary symmetry class of homo-oligomers using a language model.

Phylogenetics

    TreeFix-TP

    Error correction for viral phylogenies based on parsimonious reconciliation with a species tree.

    VirDTL

    Inference of ancestral and extant strain recombination in viral genomes using phylogenetic reconciliation.
